## This slideshow

+ Introducing Python
+ Basic Geospatial Manipulations

## Why learn Python

+ It allows for more flexibility that a GUI based GIS program.
+ Other GIS applications (e.g. QGIS, ArcGIS, postGIS) often have a Python interface.
+ generally a widely used language.
